Reviews.Title: A good basic phone with a bonus!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: The phone in itself is in no way exceptional. It is not a smart phone, but it works very well for what it is. The battery leaves something to be desired, but you can pick up an extra for about $5 so that's not really a big deal for me at all. Why did I give it four stars tho? Because you can use it to tether. I have the $50 a month unlimited prepaid plan from AT&T; and so far I have been able to use the tethered connection perfectly well. It's only 3g speeds so it's nothing exceptional, but it's certainly useful. If you want a cheap way to tether, you should consider this phone.

Reviews.Title: Bought in july-2012
Reviews.Author: smart man
Reviews.Content: This  product does not last for long duration, within 1.5 years this product stopped working, though  it was used in good manner.Better not to choose this stuff.

Reviews.Title: LG
Reviews.Author: Noles
Reviews.Content: I received this device from AT&T; for a replacement for the RAZR. What a piece of work who designed this crap. You have to manually remove your texts when it get toward the capacity. The razr lets you set it up automatically, camera worthless, keys does not respond sometimes. I just replaced this worthless device with a Pantech Renue oh what a great upgrade. I would not recommend this device to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love Them
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I loved the phone but had to return as they would not work on my network have a funny network wish I could of use them, but I do say thank they were nice taking them back.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Donna M. Ferrier
Reviews.Content: There were some very specific things I was looking for in a cell phone.  I did not want a smart phone.  What I was looking for:And easy to slide slider.  This was.And easy to use/see letter/number pad.  This was.A message alert that repeated.  This did.Easy to configure settings.  This was.A loud tone for alerts.  This is.And a good, long battery charge.  This phone excells in that.I've tried the smart phones,  and most other basic options.  This is the best I've used.  It is simple, and easy to use...as well as simple and easy to adjust all settings.  I absolutey love this phone, and if you are looking for an excellent basic phone for texting and calling-  I highly recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: No luck
Reviews.Author: K. webb "empress"
Reviews.Content: It didn't work at all.i charge it and wouldnt power on, so returned it completely. So not sure if buying cell phone is wise.

Reviews.Title: more or less
Reviews.Author: Alejandra Fuenmayor
Reviews.Content: good, I like it more or less, is very fashion for my mother and she like it  :) . .

Reviews.Title: great cell phone
Reviews.Author: Cortney
Reviews.Content: i love that i was able to find this phone! i had this phone from at&t; but it was lost a few months ago. I found the same one and was so excited to get it again. I have had no troubles with the phone and absolutely LOVE it.

Reviews.Title: started right up
Reviews.Author: virginia oberle
Reviews.Content: no problems at all with the phone, even after i dropped it in my driveway and didnt find it until the next day, raining all night. it takes a licking and it keeps on kicking

Reviews.Title: Great non-smartphone for basic and international use
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: Needed a phone which had international capabilities for use outside US.  Worked well and was able to use on non-ATT carrier & sim since it was unlocked.  By today's smart/web phone standards, this is very basic, but works for parents who do not need the bells, whistles, and all the fru-fru cell phone trappings/distractions.The phone was purchased via Amazon's merchant UnlockedCellPhoneKings using Prime and I will definately purchase again from this vendor if I need another unlocked phone.

Reviews.Title: Garbage music player, rest okay
Reviews.Author: Chris Rokusek
Reviews.Content: I have a CF360 and the music player is garbage. It locks up and freezes the entire phone. LG Customer support website is so bad that it won't allow a repair order to be generated. I have alos filed a customer support ticket has resulted in no response so far as well. Might be a great phone except the music player. The software used to update the firmware does not support the CF360 even though the LG site claims that it does.

Reviews.Title: LG CF360
Reviews.Author: AIRWOLF "THAE"
Reviews.Content: Phone is good, simple and compact for phone only users. Sound is also loud enough for noisy situation. The only thing that bother me is battery life. Fully charged and then power on without talking and only total talk time one hours, phone shows battery low and then it shut down and sometimes I am in the middle of the conversation. Not recommended for mass user.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Entertainment-focused slider phone in blue with digital audio/video player and 1.3-megapixel camera/camcorder
Compatible with AT&T; Navigator GPS, Video Share, AT&T; Mobile Music, and streaming video from Cellular Video service
Bluetooth for handsfree devices and stereo music streaming; MicroSD memory expansion to 8 GB; access to personal email and instant messaging services
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours (10+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: LG CF360 Unlocked GSM Slider Phone with GPS, 1.3MP Camera, Bluetooth, Music Player and microSD Slot - Blue/Black
